com.facebook.buck.file.downloader

Interface Downloader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Toolchain
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExplodingDownloader, HttpDownloader, OnDiskMavenDownloader, RemoteMavenDownloader, RetryingDownloader, StackedDownloader

    public interface Downloader
extends Toolchain

    • Field Detail

        static final String DEFAULT_NAME
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • fetch

        boolean fetch(BuckEventBus eventBus,
              URI uri,
              Path output)
       throws IOException
        Download the given URL and, upon a successful download, place it in output. Note that if a Downloader can't handle the URI.scheme then false will be returned.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the download succeeded.
        Throws:
        IOException - Should an exception be thrown when downloading.

      • getName

        default String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface Toolchain
